metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14802 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Nomad 0.5.0 through 0.9.4 (fixed in 0.9.5) reveals unintendedenvironment variables to the rendering task during template rendering, akaGHSA-6hv3-7c34-4hx8. This applies tonomad/client/allocrunner/taskrunner/template.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
